remarks: Existence of an operation class abstraction (version for dependent domains, i.e. the first base class may depend on the second base class), analogous to ~ mpt2exxg .  (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)
statement:
mpt2exxg2.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
mpt2exxg2 $p |- ( ( B e. R /\ A. y e. B A e. S ) -> F e. _V ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
